Package Presentation

package Presentation
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    ClientPanel
    The ClientPanel class is a Swing component that provides a graphical user interface for displaying and managing a list of clients.
    Controller
    The Controller class serves as the mediator between the user interface (View) and the business logic layer (BLL).
    OrderPanel
    GUI panel for managing orders in an order management system.
    ProductPanel
    Panel for product management operations.
    TableUtils
    The TableUtils class provides utility methods for creating table models compatible with Swing's JTable.
    View
    The View class is a graphical user interface for managing clients, products, and orders.
